# itemForLineString(overlay, geoJSON)

**Interface Method**

Overrides a line string.

## Declaration

```swift
itemForLineString?(
        overlay: PolylineOverlay,
        geoJSON: GeoJSONTypes.LineString,
    ): PolylineOverlay | null;
```

## Parameters

- **overlay**: A [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/PolylineOverlay] object.
- **geoJSON**: The original GeoJSON object for the `LineString` object.

## Return Value

A map item or an array of map items.

## Discussion

MapKit JS calls this method for each individual `LineString` geometry object. You can customize or completely replace the provided overlay before returning it.

## Overriding items

- **itemForFeature(item, geoJSON)**: Overrides a feature.
- **itemForFeatureCollection(itemCollection, geoJSON)**: Overrides a feature collection.
- **itemForMultiLineString(itemCollection, geoJSON)**: Overrides a multiline string.
- **itemForPoint(coordinate, geoJSON)**: Overrides a point.
- **itemForMultiPoint(itemCollection, geoJSON)**: Overrides a multipoint object.
- **itemForPolygon(overlay, geoJSON)**: Overrides a polygon.
- **itemForMultiPolygon(itemCollection, geoJSON)**: Overrides a multipolygon.
- **styleForOverlay(overlay, geoJSON)**: Overrides the style of overlays.
title: itemForLineString(overlay, geoJSON)
